amendment.description: To make certain engineering and architectural services eligible for the deduction relating to income attributable to United States production activities and to limit an employer's deduction for entertainment expenses of covered employees to the amount which the employee includes in income.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3138 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3138 proposed by Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S5199-5200, S5204-5205; text: CR S5199-5200) To make certain engineering and architectural services eligible for the deduction relating to income attributable to United States production activities and to limit an employer's deduction for entertainment expenses of covered employees to the amount which the employee includes in income.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3138 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3138 proposed by Senator Hutchison.
